about_the_game:
Discover the rogue survival-lite 

Dive into a survival roguelite by taking control of a S.E.E.D, an advanced reconnaissance android! To accomplish your mission, explore exoplanets to determine if they are suitable for humanity.

Thus, you'll need to search for vital elements necessary for life: Carbon, Hydrogen, Nitrogen, Oxygen, Phosphorus, and Sulfur. But beware, danger lurks on this unknown land, and your survival will depend on your ingenuity and skills.

Traps abound, and you'll need to strategize to make it through. Regularly, you'll have to shelter your character to escape ionic storms.

Exploration will allow you to acquire new skills and enjoy more autonomy, speed, and gliding. Your biggest challenge? Managing your energy to avoid extinction.

Movement is survival, movement is fun

What could be cooler than exploring an unknown planet on a snowboard?

This mode of movement, fast and fluid, offers you gliding sensations for greater freedom and intensity. Speed, adrenaline, and exploration intertwine in this unique roguelite, where moments of absolute calm collide with the unpredictable challenges of a vibrant, ever-changing world.

Energy consumption as core mechanic

In Moonwakers, the innovative energy management plays a crucial role in the gaming experience. To fully enjoy this adventure, it's essential to think strategically about how you use your energy resources. By changing your in-game mode, you save energy for Moon, your android, but that's not all! You also save energy on your computer in real life!

Eco-points, an innovative system integrated into the gameplay, reward the use of this eco mode by providing you with virtuous in-game currency! This mechanic enhances exploration, encouraging you to interact with the world around you in a more eco-friendly manner. The choice is yours, and you can switch between modes at any time during the game.

In this universe, energy is not just a means to progress; it becomes a central element of your adventure.

Learn to explore

From snowy plains to crystal forests, passing through the frozen lake and volcanic mountains, each area of this planet of ice and fire promises a unique and immersive experience.

The diversity of the environments goes beyond their appearance; it also influences the gameplay and the strategies you will need to adopt.

Do it again

Replayability is at the heart of the Moonwakers experience. With procedurally generated levels, each adventure is unique. The choices you make, both in terms of movement and energy management, directly impact your progression and interaction with this planet.

Are you a fan of speed running, or do you prefer to take your time? Let yourself glide along your desires by trying a new game!

name: Moonwakers : Episode 01

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5 9Gen or AMD 5600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated with 4GB VRAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7 10Gen or AMD 5600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated with 8GB VRAM

short_description: Moonwakers : Episode 1, the S.E.E.D cycle. Is a poetical atmospheric space top-down roguelite exploration game. In a world mostly made of ice and snow.
